TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISessionManager

Docs.summary: Used to store feature state across a session. The implementor is free to decide what constitutes a session.

Docs.param: The cancellation token to cancel the operation.
Docs.summary: Queries the session manager for the session's feature state, if any, for the given feature.
Docs.returns: The state of the feature if it is present in the session, otherwise null.

Docs.summary: Set the state of a feature to be used for a session.
